trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The rat explodes when it dies. Constitution {@variantrule Saving Throw|XPHB} {@dc 11}, each creature in a 5-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the rat. {@actSaveFail} 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 5}, Reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) Piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) Acid damage.
